Reception Given by Charge d' Affaires of Pakistani Embassy
articles.content:
Reception Given by Charge d' Affaires of Pakistani Embassy 
    Pyongyang, March 24 (KCNA) -- A reception was hosted by Ahmed Hussain Dayo, charge d' affaires ad interim of the Pakistani embassy here, Tuesday evening on the occasion of the day of Pakistan.
 Present on invitation were Minister of Commerce Ri Yong Son who is chairman of the DPRK-Pakistan Friendship Association, Vice-Minister of Foreign Affairs Kung Sok Ung, Vice-Minister of Foreign Trade Kim Jong Gi and other officials concerned.    
 Speeches were made at the reception.

articles.title: Unreasonable Action of NA Speaker Flailed
articles.content:
Unreasonable Action of NA Speaker Flailed 
    Pyongyang, March 24 (KCNA) -- The Bar Association of south Korea condemned Speaker of the "National Assembly" Pak Kwan Yong for failing to vote on the "motion on the impeachment against the president" at the "National Assembly", according to the south Korean MBC.
 The organization asserted that his taking the chair all the time during a roll call on the motion on the impeachment indicates his refusal to vote by himself, which is clearly a violation of the "National Assembly Law".    
 Accordingly, the organization said, the Constitutional Court should strictly examine this problem as well as the absence of discussion on pros and cons concerning the motion.

Tribute Paid to Kim Il Sung
articles.content:
Tribute Paid to Kim Il Sung
    Pyongyang, March 24 (KCNA) -- Li Zhaoxing, foreign minister of the People's Republic of China, and his party on March 24 visited the statue of President Kim Il Sung on Mansu Hill to pay tribute to him.
 Present there were Kim Yong Il, vice-minister of Foreign Affairs, and Wu Donghe, Chinese ambassador e.p. to the DPRK.    
 The guests laid bouquets before the statue and made a bow in humble reverence for the President who devoted his whole life to the prosperity of the country and the happiness of the people and performed immortal feats for the strengthening and development of the friendly relations between the two peoples and the accomplishment of the human cause of independence.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam Meets PRC Foreign Minister and His Party
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam Meets PRC Foreign Minister and His Party
    Pyongyang, March 24 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, met Li Zhaoxing, foreign minister of the People's Republic of China, and his party and talked with them in a friendly atmosphere at the Mansudae Assembly Hall today.
 Present there were Kim Yong Il, vice-minister of Foreign Affairs, and other officials concerned and Wu Donghe, PRC ambassador e. p. to the DPRK.

articles.title: Kang Sok Ju Meets PRC Foreign Minister
articles.content:
Kang Sok Ju Meets PRC Foreign Minister
    Pyongyang, March 24 (KCNA) -- Kang Sok Ju, first vice-minister of Foreign Affairs of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea, today met Li Zhaoxing, foreign minister of the People's Republic of China, and talked with him in a friendly atmosphere.
 Present there were officials concerned, the party of the foreign minister of the PRC and the PRC ambassador e. p. to the DPRK.
